name: pickdiff
description: A simple app to selectively diff files between two Git commits.

scripts.build: tsc && cd public && npx tsc script.ts --lib DOM,DOM.Iterable,ES2017 --target ES2017 --skipLibCheck
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit && cd public && npx tsc script.ts --noEmit --lib DOM,DOM.Iterable,ES2017 --target ES2017 --skipLibCheck
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e

author: Tyler Milner
